title: Hoy Lai Pad Nam Prik Pow (Clams with Chili Paste and Basil)

Ingredients.4: 3 tablespoons Nam Prik Pao (roasted chile paste)

Ingredients.8: 1 cup Bai Kraprao (holy basil leaves), or to taste

Directions.1: Heat a large heavy-bottomed pan or wok over high heat; add the oil and wait 1 minute more. Mix garlic into the hot oil and cook until it just turns golden brown, about 1 minute. Add clams and chile paste; stir until clams are coated.

Directions.2: Stir fish sauce, chiles, and sugar into clams; cook and stir until the clams have opened, 5 to 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Mix basil into clam mixture and cook until wilted, about 1 minute.
